ID of the policy to pause
ID of the policy to reset
ID of the policy to resume
ID of the policy to subscribe to

constructor.notice: Contract constructor sets initial treasury address

getFarmerPolicies(address,uint256).notice: Returns subscription details for a farmer in a specific season

getHistoricalSubscribers(uint256,uint256.notice: Returns historical subscribers for a specific policy and season

getPolicyDetails(uint256).notice: Returns details of a given policy

markPolicyAsPayout(uint256).notice: Marks a policy for payout (called by payout engine)

resetSeasonState(uint256).notice: Resets the state of a policy for a new season

subscribe(uint256).notice: Allows farmers to subscribe to a policy by paying the premium
